name: Budi Santoso
desc: Hi! Joy here! I’m one of the many emotions that live inside our girl Riley’s head and a firm believer that joy can be found EVERYWHERE! I’m SO excited to introduce you to all of my friends during your stay. I can’t wait for you to tap into the emotions that shape our world and create core memories you’ll be able to take home to cherish! We’re SO pumped to have you!
